person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The number of plastic surgeries in Brazil has jumped 30 percent to an estimated 150,000 this year since an anti-inflation plan was introduced in July 1994 , Farid Hakme , the president of the Brazilian Plastic Surgery Society ( SBCP ) , said .

Let's think step by step.

1. Farid Hakme

He is the identified person in the paragraph. He is the president of the Brazilian Plastic Surgery Society (SBCP) and made the statement about the increase in plastic surgeries in Brazil.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.
1. Farid Hakme (the president of the Brazilian Plastic Surgery Society)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Farid Hakme (the president of the Brazilian Plastic Surgery Society) |
